context_bundle.summary: Kratix is an open-source framework for building a composable internal developer platform on Kubernetes

onboarding.quick_start: helm install kratix https://github.com/syntasso/kratix/releases/download/v0.1.0/kratix-0.1.0.tgz && kubectl apply -f promise.yaml
common_patterns: Promise installation: 'kubectl apply -f promise.yaml' with 'Promise' custom resource definition
API workflow: 'apiVersion: platform.kratix.io/v1alpha1 kind: Promise' with metadata and spec
Resource request: 'kubectl apply -f redis-request.yaml' to request Redis instance
Promise marketplace: 'kubectl get promises' to list available promises and capabilities
Dynamic scheduling: 'kubectl get work' to see scheduled workloads across clusters
Custom promises: 'Promise' with 'apiextensions.k8s.io/v1' CRDs for custom resources
known_errors: Promise not ready: 'kubectl get promise <name> -o yaml' and check status conditions
Resource request failed: 'kubectl get events --field-selector involvedObject.kind=Promise' for error details
Worker cluster not connecting: 'kubectl get destination' and verify worker cluster registration
CRD installation error: 'kubectl get crd' and ensure Promise CRDs are properly installed
Permission denied: 'kubectl auth can-i create promises --as=system:serviceaccount:kratix:kratix-controller'
